title: EP.51: AARON DONALD, LAMAR JACKSONS CONTRACT, WEEK 1 MATCHUPS, KEVIN DURANT, AND MUCH MORE!
description: Aaron Donald was caught on film ripping off 2 helmets and swinging them at players heads. What should the NFL do? Lamar is his own agent and wants fully guaranteed money, if he doesn't have a new contract by week one he will stop negotiating. We go through and discuss all the best week one matchups starting with the Bills Vs Rams opening Thursday. Will the KD, Kyrie, and Ben Simmons trio actually work out or will their fragile stability be their downfall? Tune in to find out the answers and much more!
dc:creator: Griffin Proctor & Joe Jokonya
